title: I listen to color
description: Artist Neil Harbisson was born completely color blind, but these days a device attached to his head turns color into audible frequencies. Instead of seeing a world in grayscale, Harbisson can hear a symphony of color -- and yes, even listen to faces and paintings.
author: Neil Harbisson
keywords: TED, talks, Senses, art, design, entertainment, innovation, music, prosthetics, sound, technology
